description: Solutions Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Requirement
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: High Resilience Environment (HRE) Support Services**

**Reference Number:** cb-969-34066646

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide High Resilience Environment (HRE) support services. The successful contractor will be responsible for managing and supporting the HRE computing environment.

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of work includes:

* Providing managed services for the HRE computing environment
* Ensuring high resilience and availability of the environment
* Supporting the development and implementation of new technologies and services

**Requirements:**

* The contractor must have a minimum security level of Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* The contractor must be certified under the Canadian Government’s Security Requirements for Sensitive Information
* The contractor must have experience in providing managed services for HRE computing environments

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Eligibility:**

This tender is open only to contractors who have been pre-qualified under the EN537-05IT01 Supply Arrangement and are qualified against Tier 1, Stream 8 - Managed Services, and Designated Organization Screening (DOS) requirements.

**Timeline:**

The contract is expected to commence in October 2024 and will have a duration of approximately 12 months.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Rob Best
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
Email: [robert.best@forces.gc.ca](mailto:robert.best@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: 0000000000

**Notice URL:**

This notice is available on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

The Solution Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. If you are interested in becoming a qualified SA Holder, please contact [rcnmdai.ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rcnmdai.ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
